entry.title: Causa Esse
entry.content:
This is first real post detailing the Causa Esse (“Reason to be”) of this blog. As I am now starting my graduate student career, I plan to make a thoughtful attempt to document the interesting topics, questions, and problems which I come across in as cogent and consistent way as possible. Hence, the most modern solution to this is blogging.

Topics to be covered (including but not limited to): Software Engineering Principles, gamification techniques, reviews of software and mobile apps, Crossfit experiences, and travel experiences.

I am very excited to enter on this journey for the duration of at least 2015.

Best Regards, PulchraVita
